    • chooseResourcesForBuyAction

      public void chooseResourcesForBuyAction​(java.lang.String cardToBuyId, int chosenDeckIndex)
      Enable all resources ready to be selectable in order to buy a development card from the cards market
      Parameters:
      cardToBuyId - ID of the card that the user wants to buy
      chosenDeckIndex - the deck position in which player wants to put the development card
